ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util 
);
with(javaImport){
    let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b");
    let ALGORITHM = "DES"; 
    let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
    let CHARSET = "utf-8";
    let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN");


function decode(data){
let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes());
let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks);
let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM);
let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET));
cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv);
return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET);

}
}
//DESè§£å¯†ç»“æŸ

content=java.getElement("$.content");
saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody");
say=saybody!=""?"\nä½œè€…æœ‰è¯è¦è¯´ï¼š\n"+saybody:"";
if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){
result=String(decode(content)+say);
}else{result=content+say}
</js>

<js>

cid = baseUrl.match(/-(\d+)/)[1];
	let token = java.webView("", baseUrl, "sessionStorage.getItem('token')");
	
header =
	{"headers":	{"referer":baseUrl,
	"token":token,"client":"h5"}};
	
url = "https://m.gongzicp.com/webapi/novel/chapterGetInfo?cid="+cid+"&nid="+java.get("nid")+","+JSON.stringify(header);

html = java.ajax(url);

chapterInfo=JSON.parse(html).data.chapterInfo;
postscript=chapterInfo.postscript;
if(chapterInfo.content==""){
	result = "è®¢é˜…æœ¬ç« éœ€  "+chapterInfo.chapterPrice+ "ç‰ä½©"
	}else{
content=java.aesBase64DecodeToString(chapterInfo.content,"u0LRrbu$Enm84koA","AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding","$h$b3!iGzsYnnshj")
postscript==""?content:content+"\nä½œè€…æœ‰è¯è¯´ï¼š"+postscript;
}
</js>

$ = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));

url = "https://m.gongzicp.com/webapi/zone/userGetNovelList?uid="+userid+"&type=coll";

list =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));
a= JSON.parse(result).data.list || []
result = a.concat(list.data.list);
result = JSON.stringify(result);
}catch(e){}
}

if(baseUrl.match(/usercoll\/getList/)){
result=result.replace(/[\s\S]+?<pre.*?>|<\/pre>[\s\S]+/g,'');
}else{
	result=result
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
c = cookie.getKey("https://read.douban.com","dbcl2")

cok = String(/\d+:/.test(c)?c.match(/(\d+):/)[1]:"anonymous");

t = java.getString("$.data");


script = `<script>
t = "${t}";
function name(t){
  const e = Uint8Array.from(window.atob(t), (t=>t.charCodeAt(0)))
    , i = e.buffer
    , u = e.length - 16 - 13
    , d = new Uint8Array(i,u,16)
    , p = new Uint8Array(i,0,u)
    , f = {};
    f.name = "AES-CBC",
    f["iv"] = d,
  c = new TextEncoder().encode("${cok}");
  return window["crypto"]["subtle"]["digest"]("SHA-256", c)
  .then(t=>window["crypto"]["subtle"]["importKey"]("raw", t, "AES-CBC", !0, ["decrypt"])
  .then(t=>window["crypto"]["subtle"]["decrypt"](f, t, p))
  
  .then(t=>JSON.parse((new TextDecoder).decode(t)))
 .then(t=>t.posts[0].contents));
}
(async function () {
  result = await name(t)
  })();
</script>`;
result = java.webView(script,baseUrl,"result");
result = result.match(/"(?:content|text)":"([\s\S]*?)","/g).join("\n");
</js>

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
list=JSON.parse(result);
Json=[]
for(i in list){
if(list[i].title.indexOf(java.get('key'))>-1){
Json.push(list[i])
}
}
result=JSON.stringify(Json)
</js>
$.[*]
ruleSearch.name: $.title

ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
aid = "{{$.id}}"==""?"{{@@href}}".match(/ebook\/(\d+)/)[1]:"{{$.id}}";
url = "https://read.douban.com/j/article_v2/get_reader_data";
body = "aid="+aid;
result = url +","+ JSON.stringify({
	"method":"POST",
	"body":String(body),
	"headers":{
		"referer":"https://read.douban.com/reader/column/{{baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\//)[1]}}/chapter/"+aid+"/",
		"X-CSRF-TOKEN":java.get("X-CSRF-TOKEN")
		}
	});
</js>
